General.Name: Contango Holdings PLC
General.Description: Contango Holdings plc engages in the development of the mineral resources in Zimbabwe and Mali. It owns a 70% interest in the Lubu Coal project, which covers 19,236 hectares located in the Hwange mining district in north-western Zimbabwe; and interests in the Garalo-Ntiela gold project covering an area of 161.5km2 located in Mali. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 1 Charterhouse Mews, London, United Kingdom, EC1M 6BB
